page.title: 14SUN VALLEY POULTRY FARM
page.content: This 2.5 acre site supplies turkeys for{Sun Valley Poultry's}Hereford plant. The manager, who works a 9 hour day, and his wife and a local girl, who work part time, are the only employees. The 2 turkey houses cover about 2,800 sq.ft. and in them 22,000 young poults are raised for 64 days, with 10 days cleaning space between each new batch. Sun Valley have a special breed - one of the top 3 breeds in the world. The birds' diet consits of maize, wheat, soya, recycled vegetable oil and animal fat. They are reared under low lights, and the dimming of these lights contrils their erratic behaviour. When ready for slaughter, the hens weigh about 12-15 lb, and the males 24-30 lb.
